news_header: Pekka Lundmark expresses confidence in Nokia's mobile networks as the company reports strong financial results, with significant growth in turnover and operating profit.
news_text: Pekka Lundmark is optimistic about Nokia's mobile networks following a strong financial performance, with a 10% increase in turnover to nearly EUR 6 billion and an operating profit exceeding 1.1 billion. Despite challenges in the mobile network sector, particularly in the U.S., Nokia has seen growth in network infrastructure and private mobile networks. Lundmark highlights new agreements with major companies and anticipates stability in mobile networks, while also exploring opportunities in defense and artificial intelligence. He believes the competition in AI will benefit the market and drive investments.
